free_text.Prerequisite for: Electrometry, Theory of Signal, Telecommunication, Information and coding, fiability
free_text.Content: Elementary combinatorial analysis: Review of elements of set theory and counting problems.[br/][br/]Elementary probability: Probability distributions, independent events, conditional probability.[br/][br/]Repeating random experiments: Bernoulli trials, binomial, geometric, negative binomial and hypergeometric probability distributions, limit theorems, random walk.[br/][br/]Random variables: discrete and continuous random variables, expectation, variance and covariance, moment generating function, change of variables technique, joint random variables, independent random variables.[br/][br/]Independent random variables and limit theorems: Sums of independent random variables, laws of large numbers, central limit theorem and applications[br/][br/]Bayesian inference and likelihood, maximum likelihood estimation, Gaussian and other elementary examples, confidence intervals, hypothesis testing.[br/][br/]Other topics as time permits, chosen from simulation, Poisson processes, inference.
free_text.Type of teaching: Ex cathedra lecture, exercises in the classroom
free_text.Learning outcomes: To present the fundamental concepts and methods of probability theory and statistics.

en.title: Probabilities and statistics

free_text.Contenu: Combinatoire élémentaire : Rappel des notions de la théorie des ensembles et des notions de combinatoire.[br/][br/]Notions de probabilités : Distributions de probabilités, indépendance, probabilités conditionnelles.[br/][br/]Suites d'expériences aléatoires : Le schéma de Bernoulli, lois binomiales, géométriques, binomiales négatives et hypergéométriques, théorèmes limites.[br/][br/]Variables aléatoires discrètes et continues, espérance, variance et covariance, changement des variables, couples de variables aléatoires, variables aléatoires indépendantes.[br/][br/]Variables aléatoires indépendantes et théorèmes limites : Somme de variables aléatoires indépendantes, lois des grands nombres, théorème central limite, la pratique du théorème central limite.[br/][br/]Inférence bayesienne et la vraisemblance, maximum de vraisemblance, échantillons gaussiens et autres cas élémentaires, intervalles de confiance, tests.[br/][br/]Autres sujets choisis parmi simulation, processus de Poisson, inférence statistique.[br/]
